title: How is everyone feeling about the preseason changes on PBE?
body:
Let's discuss, because I'm interested in how people feel about all of it.

I'm pretty excited for the MF and Kog'maw changes, personally. I'm thinking MF with that new Firecannon item, maybe?
I honestly liked what I saw, until I started getting down the to some of the items and actually reading out the new mastery trees.
Masteries are basically braindead now, but I hate them anyway so not really that upset.

Excitement for the sightstone+gold income combo items, but at the same time, the glowly ball of go fast was nerfed and it is currently my favorite support item. And also, now if you upgrade the sightstone to be goldyrocks, you can't also get a support item, right? So we'll see how that goes. Probably a good thing for those "supports" who play Brand(or other dps) bot and build straight damage with no wards.

I'm digging the trinket changes as well, since now nobody will have to remember up grade it. Ahem...
